long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
wotMatters is a great way to keep all of your tasks, documents and links together, so you can stay focused on the most important things, and have it all at your finger tips. 
This chrome extension allow you to store links to any web page you want to associate with a task within wotMatters.
